QuestData.Title: Fox Mastery
QuestData.Description: So, when I was scouting east of here I saw a collection of foxes. That's what I first learned to hunt when back on the Wandering Isle.$b$bIf you want to see the challenge a young pandaren hunter faced when growing up, head east and face off against a bunch of foxes. They tend to be clever and cunning so be on your guard.
QuestData.CompletionText: I used to go on fox hunts with my father. If he could see me now! Hunting in Pandaria!
QuestData.RewardText: Well done! You outfoxed the foxes. I will talk to Mr. Pleeb about getting you another trophy made.
